Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Main Street, south of the Reclaimation Plant.
Room.LongDescription: The large Oceancrest Central Recycling Plant and Reclaimation Center, a fancy name for a dump, is used to collect old and used up trash from all over the city. There are smaller collection sites around the city, but they all end up here eventually. Most of the equipment that finds its way here usually ends up as scrap metal, used to create new weapons at a cheaper cost.
